title: MUST SEE!! All New Penthouse Flat with Patio
posting_body: 1327 S. Van Ness St., San Francisco 94110
Gorgeous top floor flat featuring high-end design and decor with modern amenities, including 12-foot high ceilings and an in-unit washer/dryer.

You'll love the stylish and modern kitchen featuring premium, stainless steel appliances, including a full-size refrigerator/freezer, a five-burner gas stove and range with hood, dishwasher and microwave.
An abundance of handsome, all white cabinets with black handles stand out against the sheik, herringbone-pattern backsplash.
The open-concept kitchen spills over the white marble countertop into the large, open living area, which features a dining nook with banquette bench in one corner.
The living area flows out onto the back patio, which offers stunning views of Bernal Hill and the city skyline.
Working from home can be a pleasure in one of the five bright, sunny bedrooms, each of which features a custom closet.
Each of the three bathrooms features marble showers with high-end fixtures, and new vanities.

Just a short walk away are a myriad of fabulous restaurants, shops, galleries and beautiful parks in this vibrant neighborhood, giving the property a 99/100 Walk score, 100/100 Bike score and 85/100 Transit score.
Literal steps away from the property is 24th Street, a lively, tree-lined street boasting several Latino-owned businesses like La Palma Mexicatessan, La Victoria Panaderia and La Torta Gorda.
The newest and trendiest corridor of the Mission District is 20th Street.

There you'll find expert cocktails at True Laurel, Trick Dog and Lost Resort, inventive Italian food at Penny Roma, fresh-out-of-the-oven bread at Tartine Manufactory and lines out the door at San Francisco's newest must-eat restaurant, Ernest.
Or choose from local favorites like La Taqueria, La Cumbre, and El Farolito.

Other restaurants you can't miss are Venga Empanadas, known for its stuffed pastries; Lolinda, with its delectable Argentine-style cuts from the grill; and Good Good Culture Club, a standout modern Asian menu and a lush rooftop.
Cats & Dogs Considered W/Additional Deposit ($300 Cat/$500 Dog)
Gross Monthly Income of at least 2.5x rent
